statements: SELECT * FROM vehicle_telemetry_data;
SELECT vehicle_id, speed, temperature FROM vehicle_telemetry_data WHERE fuel_level > 50;
SELECT location, temperature FROM vehicle_telemetry_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_telemetry_data WHERE speed BETWEEN 60 AND 80;
SELECT vehicle_id, location FROM vehicle_telemetry_data WHERE temperature < 20;
SELECT vehicle_id, location, timestamp FROM vehicle_telemetry_data WHERE speed > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_telemetry_data WHERE temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY temperature ASC, timestamp DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, speed FROM vehicle_telemetry_data WHERE fuel_level < 50 ORDER BY speed DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT vehicle_id, speed, temperature FROM vehicle_telemetry_data WHERE location LIKE '%highway%' OR location LIKE '%freeway%' ORDER BY timestamp ASC, speed DESC;
SELECT timestamp, fuel_level FROM vehicle_telemetry_data WHERE speed > 80 AND temperature > 25 ORDER BY timestamp LIMIT 20;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_data;
SELECT timestamp, location, speed FROM vehicle_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, location, speed FROM vehicle_data WHERE speed > 50;
SELECT vehicle_id, location, mileage FROM vehicle_data WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT vehicle_id, timestamp, sensor_type, sensor_value FROM sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT timestamp, location, speed FROM vehicle_data WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'temperature' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT location, speed, mileage FROM vehicle_data WHERE speed > 100 AND mileage < 50000;
SELECT vehicle_id, timestamp, sensor_type, sensor_value FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_value > 50 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_data JOIN sensor_data ON vehicle_data.vehicle_id = sensor_data.vehicle_id WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY sensor_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_data;
SELECT vehicle_id, timestamp, speed FROM vehicle_data WHERE speed > 100;
SELECT * FROM driver_data ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT driver_id, name, contact_number FROM driver_data WHERE driver_id = 5;
SELECT journey_id, vehicle_id, driver_id, start_location, end_location FROM journey_data WHERE start_location = 'City A' AND end_location = 'City B';
SELECT * FROM vehicle_data WHERE speed > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT speed, location FROM vehicle_data WHERE speed BETWEEN 50 AND 70 ORDER BY vehicle_id;
SELECT DISTINCT name FROM driver_data WHERE contact_number LIKE '555%';
SELECT journey_id, start_location, end_location FROM journey_data WHERE start_location <> end_location ORDER BY journey_id ASC;
SELECT vehicle_id, MAX(speed) AS max_speed FROM vehicle_data GROUP BY vehicle_id HAVING MAX(speed) > 120;
SELECT * FROM vehicles;
SELECT make, model, year FROM vehicles WHERE year > 2010 ORDER BY make ASC;
SELECT vehicle_id, make, model, year FROM vehicles WHERE make = 'Toyota' ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT telemetry_id, vehicle_id, timestamp FROM telemetry_data WHERE latitude BETWEEN 40.0 AND 42.0 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT log_id, vehicle_id, maintenance_date, description FROM maintenance_logs WHERE description LIKE '%oil%' ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE make = 'Toyota';
SELECT make, model, year FROM vehicles WHERE year > 2010 ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, make, model, year FROM vehicles WHERE make IN ('Honda', 'Ford') ORDER BY vehicle_id;
SELECT * FROM telemetry_data WHERE latitude > 40.0 AND longitude < -100.0;
SELECT trip_id, start_time, end_time, distance FROM trip_data WHERE distance BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY start_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_name, vehicle_type, manufacture_year FROM vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_name, manufacture_year, last_telemetry_timestamp FROM vehicles ORDER BY manufacture_year DESC;
SELECT * FROM telemetry_data WHERE speed > 100 ORDER BY telemetry_timestamp ASC;
SELECT driver_name, driver_contact FROM drivers WHERE driver_license LIKE 'ABC%' ORDER BY driver_name;
SELECT * FROM vehicles ORDER BY vehicle_id DESC;
SELECT vehicle_name, vehicle_type FROM vehicles WHERE manufacture_year > 2010;
SELECT vehicle_name, last_telemetry_timestamp, speed FROM vehicles LEFT JOIN telemetry_data ON vehicles.vehicle_id = telemetry_data.vehicle_id;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_description LIKE '%tire%';
SELECT vehicle_name, driver_name, assignment_date FROM vehicles INNER JOIN assignments ON vehicles.vehicle_id = assignments.vehicle_id INNER JOIN drivers ON assignments.driver_id = drivers.driver_id;
